title: Ashe/Garen Introductory Chest Not Received
body:
I am level 7 in client currently, and level six is displayed on the boards. I have been above level five for well over 24 hours and have not received the chest containing the champion shards for Ashe and Garen. I saw a post from several months ago where another user had the same problem and Riot added the chest to their account. Could someone help me resolve this? 

Thanks.

replies.body: That chest can take a little bit to add sometimes. How long have you been level 7, and have you still not seen it yet?
I hit level seven right before posting that.  I had hit level six on the 24th and then didn't play again until the 30th due to a busy schedule.
Wait a minute, im level 28 on my one account and I don't have the chests either?? we supposed to be getting free rewards?
You most likely already got the rewards. Currently, it's a special hextech chest, but it used to be 400 RP. You may have gotten the reward back when it was still RP.
